sent.orig: I told you yesterday and the day before yesterday, 'he shouted.
sent.trans: “我昨天和前天都告诉过您了，”他大叫着。

sent.orig: Xiao Feng asked for leave the day before yesterday, Coach Liu called at his home yesterday.
sent.trans: 小冯前天请假了，昨天刘教练到他家看过他。

sent.orig: By yesterday ( the day before yesterday )
No one can call back yesterday; Yesterday will not be called again.
I was sixty-two yesterday. Yesterday was my birthday.
sent.trans: 我昨天62岁了。昨天是我的生日。
